title: How Do You Veterans Feel About The Rune Changes?
body: Personally i feel weird about them cause they're exciting and I can already imagine the possibilities on my favorite champions, **_but _**there's now much more crap to worry about: Summoner Spells, Rune Buffed Summoner Spells, Keystone Runes, Mastery Keystones,  Item Actives, and Champ abilities and how they're suddenly influenced by the runes (I think an 8 second cooldown Lux ult was mentioned somewhere).
